me.timothy.bots.impl

Class FlatFileDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.timothy.bots.Database
      • me.timothy.bots.impl.FlatFileDatabase

  • public class FlatFileDatabase
extends Database
    A basic flat-file database that uses 1 line in each file to save a fullname. It is not recommended you use this if you plan on having a more sophisticated database where SQL is more appropriate
    Author:
    Timothy
